Using this approach, Mentor seeks to deliver a higher price to founders for a smaller slice of their business. Originally, Mentor Capital was formed in Silicon Valley in 1985 with $1,000 by current CEO, Chet Billingsley. The company completed dozens of early private acquisitions and went public in 1995.
